item.title: Python Post
item.description: #R library(reticulate) #Python #import seaborn as sns #df = sns.load_dataset('diamonds') #R #df1<-py$df #library(ggplot2) #ggplot()+geom_histogram(df1$carat,df1$price) #Python #import numpy as np #mat1=np.array([[1,2],[3,4]]) #R #mat2<-solve(py$mat1) #Python #np.dot(mat1, mat2).round()
